Instance Method# textField(_:shouldChangeCharactersInRanges:replacementString:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
@MainActor
optional func textField(
    _ textField: UITextField,
    shouldChangeCharactersInRanges ranges: [NSValue],
    replacementString string: String
) -> Bool
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/UIKit/UITextFieldDelegate/textField(_:shouldChangeCharactersInRanges:replacementString:)#parameters)

`textField`The text field asking the delegate

`ranges`The ranges of the text that should be deleted before replacing

## [Return Value](/documentation/UIKit/UITextFieldDelegate/textField(_:shouldChangeCharactersInRanges:replacementString:)#return-value)

Returns YES if the text at the `ranges` should be replaced.

## [Discussion](/documentation/UIKit/UITextFieldDelegate/textField(_:shouldChangeCharactersInRanges:replacementString:)#discussion)

Asks the delegate if the text at the specified `ranges` should be replaced with `string`.

If this method returns YES then the text field will, at its own discretion, choose any one of the specified `ranges` of text and replace it with the specified `replacementString` before deleting the text at the other ranges.
